title: Champions you HATE to be on a team with?
body:
**In MY experience** I hate being on the same team with {{champion:9}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:36}} and the unforgettable{{champion:266}} .. 

You guys?

replies.body: Lee Sin, Vayne, and Yasuo on EITHER team tends to be a completely terrible game for me.
This guy knows what's up.
yep, but im the retard playing those champs

Why do you hate playing with Ori?
A good Ori will shield you, speed you up, and can win every fight using her ult.
i dont just added her cuz i couldnt think of anyone else lol;

Vaynes. Vayne players are such spoiled assholes who look for any excuse to autotilt and sabotage your game.

Udyr players have a severe concussion from getting assaulted by a psychopath wearing a mask, and continue to try and rush Sated Devourer, even a year after it was removed.

And Nasus players think that having 1000+ stacks means they do no damage.

Used to hate being on a team with Ivern but people are actually good with him now, so it's become a non-issue.

I hate being on a team with Yi because he is only useful if he gets fed. If he doesn't get fed, you might as well be playing 4v5.
yasuo 100%

{{champion:266}}  1 v1 Bruh!

{{champion:136}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:44}}
I ban yasuo whenever im not playing him because silver yasuos tend to feed, and feed and feed
Lee sin. Generally not that good

get shit talked by entire team as {{champion:266}} top

surrenders @20 4 yes's to my no because they are negative in score, and attitude, and I am the only one positive, sure, aatrox is weak...

vayne and ash

I am noticing a trend of players playing these champs and being either dicks and or being totally incompetent. The lack of self peel can make they needy and cocky at the same time.
A lot of solo kill champs are annoying. They wonder pf, trying to make them plays
does {{champion:115}} count?
Hmmm not per se. Could be I guess
{{champion:75}}  4v5
Teemo, Shaco and, more recently, Ivern.
Eh, all my shacos carry..{{champion:35}}
